evidence_in_dialogue: [[Brass]] so , the gang unit says our d.b is a sixteen-year-old tyson plummer

[[Officer]] we 've got a four-fifteen-a on scene
[[Nick]] hoo ... so , you 've got a samuel mendez with a cracked skull listed as death imminent , right ?
[[Dr._Franks]] he 's got blunt-force trauma to the frontal and sphenoid bones
[[Catherine]] well , there 's only one way to find out

[[Sofia_Curtis]] your print belongs to an enlisted man private first class phillip riley
